This elegantly shimmering piece with 54" x 4Yards Iridescent Premium Sequin Fabric Bolt comprises of shiny sequin beads crafted atop tulle netting with the utmost perfection. The seamless glitz and glam will add heaps of royal sheen and glamorous appeal to whatever this extravagant masterpiece will embrace.

This particularly dazzling fabric is a perfect choice for crafting something elegant, graceful, and fit for royalty. The very design of this glittering fabric exudes joie de vivre and radiance. Style your dresses or embellish your decor brightly, boldly and beautifully with this truly breathtaking masterpiece.
Shimmering sequins have been laced throughout with iridescent thread to augment its vivacity and sparkle. Like its name, this shimmering piece showcases your prestige, status, and beguiling charisma. Indulge your creativity with this charming material and drape your dreary arches, tables, chairs, and aisle with the lustrous glimmer and alluring elegance of this extravagant material.

This gorgeously designed Psychedelic Chemical Sequin Style fabric is a sure way to spruce up any dreary decoration and ambiance. The astonishing embellishing elements of embroider, sequins and tulle netting have intricately been fused together to give this empyrean masterpiece. Enlivening interlocking web look has been created by embroidering in a spectacular manner. To glam up the visual appeal of this exquisite piece, our designers thought of studding it with shimmering beaded sequin fabric. The impeccable sheen and glamorous look of this superb sequin fabric bolt is heightened when you exhibit it with glinting LED effect or underneath the natural sunshine. Design swanky outfits for brides, bridesmaids, or flower girls to add an ethereal touch to your dressing line, or decorate your walls, ceilings, aisle, arches, and furniture with this classy material. The glitz and glam of your appearance and decor will surely impress your guests manifold who will be flabbergasted by the sublime aura of the event.

Burlap material has an unique smell and is unavoidable. This is not a defect, and is actually indication that this is 100% authentic burlap material.
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Augment the harmony of nature and pleasure by using our premium quality CHAMBURY CASA Fine Rustic Burlap Tablecloth in a truly natural tone. This sturdy fabric will efficiently handle the roughness and coarseness of natural surroundings. This simple, yet classy jute tablecloth can be accentuated with fabrics with more contemporary and earthly tones or pure white fabric and fine china.

 

Additional Information:

  • Quantity: 1 Rectangle Tablecloth
  • Material: Burlap
  • Color: Natural
  • Size: 90" x 156"
  • Uses: Wedding, Party, Event, Banquet, Decoration
  • How to Care: Dry Clean Only
  • Note: The smell can dissipate some by leaving in open air, but may still be noticeable. Please keep this in mind when ordering.
